repository.versionparser:
-- Get the current page. local uiPage = tonumber(page) or 1 -- Get the index of the next page. local strNextPageMatch = tostring(uiPage + 1) local strNextPage
local strProjectUrl = string.gsub('/muhkuh-sys/[dotgroup]-[module]/', '%[(%w+)%]', replace) local function escapeRe(a) return string.gsub(a, "[%^%$%(%)%%%.%[%]%*%+%-%?]", function(s) return '%'..s end) end local strVersionRe = '^' .. escapeRe(strProjectUrl..'tree/') .. '(v[0-9.]+)$' local strPagesRe = '^' .. escapeRe(strProjectUrl..'releases?page=') .. '([0-9]+)$'
-- Extract the links. local astrVersions = {} for _, n0 in ipairs(document:getElementsByTagName('a')) do local strHref = n0:getAttribute('href') local strVersion = string.match(strHref, strVersionRe) if strVersion~=nil then table.insert(astrVersions, strVersion) end local strPage = string.match(strHref, strPagesRe) if strPage==strNextPageMatch then strNextPage = strNextPageMatch end end
return astrVersions, strNextPage
